caller_intent: The caller wanted to understand why their Progressive auto insurance premium increased from $200 to $450 per month.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's policy details (address, vehicle, coverage).
Explained a 7.5% North Carolina base rate increase effective July 1, 2025.
Notified the caller of a March 21, 2025, major-at-fault accident with 3 points added to their record.
Clarified the accident caused an additional rate increase on the July 28, 2025, policy renewal.
Noted North Carolina's new 5-year surcharge window for accidents (previously 3 years).
Mentioned no alternative carriers with better pricing for Progressive's current policy structure.
knowledge_required: North Carolina auto insurance rate regulations
Impact of accident points on premium calculations
systems_referenced: Insurance carrier database for accident records
summary: The caller's premium increased due to a 7.5% state-mandated rate hike and a recent accident with 3 points. The agent explained both factors and noted the new 5-year surcharge window in North Carolina. No alternative carriers were available with better pricing for the current policy structure.
